page.title: 01HIGH HOUSLEY FARM
page.content: HIGH HOUSLEY FARM is a mixed farm.It is situated on the outskirts of CRAGHEAD.This farm consists of 36 animals which are kept in barns.They include cows,pigs,goats,sheep and poultry.During Summer and Winter the animals are fed turnips,barley,hay and corn which is bought as fodder.All the animals are also bought in.The farmer does not have employees,he and his family do all the work on the farm. The farmer's day begins at 4:00 AM. He feeds the stock first and his farming day lasts about 16 hours.The farmer grows crops such as grass,corn, barley and oats.He uses all of his 120 acres for crop growing.Some crops are sold and the rest are used as fodder.
